content: Mark, This is a great article and very informative. But It is way out of my league. I was only trying to raise a total of $150,000 and even with that, I was asked why I needed “so much money”. I wrote the article linked to below out of frustration, nevertheless, my points are valid. Two years of failed attempts to get traditional VC Funding (even having people actually laugh in my face) and I decided I would try Crowdfunding. It has also been a failure. I would be interested in knowing what you think of my points. — — — — — — — At the moment my greatest need is for people to help me promote my Crowdfunding campaign. I just published my frustration with this in a post here on LinkedIn. Why Doesn’t CrowdFunding Work for The Handicapped Or The Elderly? If you are able and have the time to help, here are the two posts I recommend.
